page.title: 16LANDSCAPE
page.content: In the new enclosures are large stands of Coniferous Commercial Timber which are expected to mature in 40-50 years time. Where the Plateau Gravels have been penetrated by Denudation proesses there are several patches of Pastural or arable farmland e.g. OTTERWOOD FARM (411020) and ROLLESTONE FARM (433029). The good mix of clays and sands has produced fertile loamy soils. (see Farming). The eastern perimeter of two area has been modified by the Urban landscape. In the late 30's and the past World War II years there was an expansion of housing in the area as the demands of local industrybexpanded. Yhe main protection of our local enviroment is conducted by the Forestry Commission who have organised Picnic and Recreation places.
